mapper.update: update andji_basic_version_base set VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_URL = #{versionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_STATUS = #{versionStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADD_USER = #{addUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, ADD_USER_NAME = #{addUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_TYPE = #{appType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FORCE_UPDATE = #{forceUpdate,jdbcType=TINYINT} where VERSION_ID = #{versionId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select VERSION_ID, VERSION_NO, VERSION_URL, VERSION_STATUS, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER, ADD_USER_NAME, APP_TYPE, FORCE_UPDATE from andji_basic_version_base where VERSION_ID = #{versionId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select VERSION_ID, VERSION_NO, VERSION_URL, VERSION_STATUS, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER, ADD_USER_NAME, APP_TYPE, FORCE_UPDATE from andji_basic_version_base
